briefdescription.para: Tag the type of B-splines.

briefdescription.para: Tag the second dimension of the space.
Tag the order of continuity of the B-splines basis at the O-point.
Instantiate a PolarSplineEvaluator with boundary evaluation conditions.

detaileddescription.para: Instantiate a PolarSplineEvaluator by specifying how points lying outside the domain should be evaluated. The domain is the domain on which the polar splines are defined.

parameterdescription.para: A class containing an operator which can be called to provide a boundary value to evaluate a point lying outside the domain.

briefdescription.para: Instantiate a PolarSplineEvaluator from another.

parameterdescription.para: Another PolarSplineEvaluator (lvalue).

briefdescription.para: Instantiate a PolarSplineEvaluator from another temporary.

parameterdescription.para: Another temporary PolarSplineEvaluator (rvalue).

briefdescription.para: Assign a PolarSplineEvaluator from another.

parameterdescription.para: Another PolarSplineEvaluator (lvalue).

briefdescription.para: Assign a PolarSplineEvaluator from another temporary.

parameterdescription.para: Another temporary PolarSplineEvaluator (rvalue).
